text: Santa Teresa Gallura (Lungòni, Lungòne) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 5,277 people lived there. Its area is 102.29 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 40 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Santa Teresa Gallura
